segments.text: I'm starting to get a little tired.
Yeah, I think now it should be...
Sorry, sorry. You know, YouTube is bullying me. I'm here now. I'm here now.
It is the lady of the hour.
That was totally not my fault.
Yes, Gura-senpai, once again, for my viewers, I would like to say, Gura-senpai, thank you for accepting my invite to collab with you, even though the one-month collab ban is not lifted yet.
And once again, it is my absolute pleasure to play with you, Kiara.
How did that feel yesterday, being called Gura-senpai by me?
It made my heart go flutter flutter.
And I felt very rosy red in my cheeks and my face.
I'm not used to it yet, but I think I'll be used to it soon, maybe.
Okay, we'll see how long I can put that act up, though.
Alright, so today we're playing Mario Kart, which we are both totally professionals at, right?
I don't really know what that word means, but you do use it a lot, don't you?
Yes, obliterate it. It's like the TNT in Minecraft, when you set it off.
Getting... When you set it off?
When you make TNT go boom, it's going to obliterate the stone around it.
Okay, I see, I see, I see.
So, by the way, we're playing on both...
We're streaming on both channels, so you can see both views.
And we are doing you guys the absolute favor and honor of being able to play with us.
Boot up the Nintendo Switch, boys and girls!
Wait, let me copy that and post the code in the chat.
Once I join myself so that we have space and they don't join before us...
Gudet, are you ready to hide the code?
I am ready to hide the code. Shall I begin?
There we go. There we go. There we go.
Here we go. Hold on. Hold on.
Oh god. I wonder if my people are...
Wait, I wasn't able to join.
Are you in? Are you in?
No, I'm still putting the code in. I'm still...
Wait, if you... You were already in my room though.
It should be in your list of previously visited tournaments though.
Oh god, there's someone in there that looks exactly like me. I don't know why.
Okay. Wait, I'm here. I will join. Join?
Yeah, you probably should join quickly because people know the code from previous tournaments.
There's a Kiara fake in there!
Oh man... Good dog! Good dog!
Are you in? Are you in?
Hopefully it doesn't start... There you go!
The time I first saw you in the game...
Okay, we're starting right away. I want to go for Sunshine Airport.
But you really stand out there.
Do you know which one is me? There's like three Kialas looking like me.
Do you know which one it is?
Yes, it's the one right next to me.
No, it's the one with the purple eyes.
Yes, of course, I'm from Australia, by the way.
Totally ignore it. I mean, that's the flag of Australia.
I didn't know Australia flag looked like that.
I guess I need to go back to class.
Oh shit, I missed the item.
Gura, I'm sorry. Beforehand, I'll probably be cursing a lot. I'm sorry.
How do you go up the bone?
Wait, Gura, is that next to me? Is that you?

Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi! Oi
Big Kiara poked small Gura in her butt.
I see, we're pretty much like...
We're pretty much on the same level.
We don't seem to have much of a space between us, we're almost always around the same spot
How do you... Can't you, like, jump off the things? You can, like...
Like, when you, like, do a jump, you can...
Oh, see, I don't know how to do that.
Because you used to shake the Wii controller.
Well, if you have... What's it called again?
What's it called again? The fancy thing.
That was close, though! That was really close!
Nice one! Nice first match, Kura!
Apparently, when you go off the jump, you press one of the R buttons.
And it makes you do a trick and you get a speed boost.
Oh! By the way, guys, so that we give more people a chance to join...
Please leave the room after one match.
And then new people can come in. Thank you!
Also, fake Kiana, you also have to leave.
Oh nice, everyone follows the rules, that's what I like to see
Oh, a new one came in.
Which one would you like to do next, Gura?
I mean, people are probably gonna...
They're probably gonna vote against us, but...
Oh, what's the code? Should I put the code?
Oh yeah, I'll put it as a pinned comment.
Oh, okay. I have not done that.
Oh, there we go! There we go!
I think we're already full anyway.
Okay, I'm gonna go for a ribbon road.
Hold on, hold on, hold on. I'm boosting it, I'm boosting it.
I love how you look as a... What's it called? Amiibo? Amiibo?
I think it's just a me
Doesn't it look just like me?
Even the body size is perfect
I just pulled the slider all the way down
You gotta be realistic, right? So people will recognize you.
I went down. I'm down by the bottom.
Guna, do you have a driving license?
I don't know how to drive!
Neither in my regard, nor in real life.
Actually, I'm playing through the OBS screen. I don't even know which...
I'm also playing... Oh no, I'm playing Julia!
I gotta be faster than Gura!

I don't know what place I- I must be number 1. It must be number 1. It makes totally sense because people are in front of me. That means I'm so fast that I'm catching up on the people that are last. Anyway, that was me.
Maybe I am number- No, I'm not. Actually, I could just take a look-
I like this because when I played Mario Kart against Ina before, she was better than me, but you're pretty much the same as me.
Where are you? Where are you?
I'm right behind you, I'm gonna...
Stay there! Stay there, Kura! Look at my butt!
Oh, I'm gonna puke all night.
Did I beat you? Did I beat you?
Damn, people can't see what we're...
Guys, leave it up to your imagination what placement I have always.
Who wants to challenge these professional Mario Kart drivers?
Who wants to be humiliated by us?
What was that you showed me before we started the stream?
I'm still... I'm practicing it, but...
I don't know what I want.
Wait, do you do it like... Is it in your troll when you do that?
Yeah, I'm not sure what I'm doing. Can you do a turkey sound?
A turkey where I'm from sounds like...
Come on, come on, come on...
Yes, exactly! It's gobble, gobble, gobble.
Nah, nah, nah. They sound more like...
That was a suffering very suffering checking
Do you remember anything besides the マジふざけんな that I taught you?
Oh, my Gura is gone on my side. I'll fix it in a second.
Do you remember any other Japanese that I taught you?
マジふざけんなあ You already said that one
I think you have not remembered many
But it's okay, I didn't expect you to...
Is there other ways to be sweaty than...
Wait, did you send someone to me? Nothing hit me, though.
Aw, dang it. Yeah, I sent out a cloud.
Okay, I'm gonna wait until Gurira is in front of me, and then I'll shoot that on her.
Gurira, are you still behind me? Are you still behind me?
You're taking your goddamn sweet time!
Okay, one second. Let me fix my...
Let me get back to Gouda's room once again.
Gouda cheese? You mean Gouda cheese? Oh, there you are. Perfect.
Oh! Is it pronounced Gouda in English?
Oh, in German we say Gouda.
That sounds even more like you in English than Gouda cheese.
Okay, new people, come in and challenge us!
The turkey sound completely messed up my throat.
It's okay. I like trying new bird sounds.
I learn a lot of things about myself when I do that.
Ah, a journey in self-exploration to bird sounds.
Like a cuckoo, cuckoo bird. Cuckoo!
Oh, that's cute! What the hell! Thank you!
I'll add that to my repart...
Your arsenal. That's what I would say.
I think you use that differently.
Yeah, okay. It's my arsenal. Hell yeah.
Okay, don't quote me on that, guys.
By the way, I can do a...
I can do a... I can do a crow sound.
Wait, where did you go? You left again?
You don't want to be next to me, huh?
Well, we'll fix that soon, TM.
Hold on, I'm getting tricked... tricked... I'm getting rekt! I meant to say shark and rekt.
What's going on? Are you like behind... Are you 12 right now?
Nice! Stay there, Gura! It's the... You know how you can see a glass is half empty and a glass is half full?
Now if you see it as half full, then you're number one right now.
Technically, that means I'm about to lap everybody, so you better stay in the front end.
how do you get up there so fast okay never mind it's okay though it's okay
I'm bigger than you now. Oh, no, I'm not.
Oh, I'm riding on your... Yeah!
Bye, my girl! Oh, that was a nice day.
Oh, I like the music in the background.
One second, let me get back to good...
Why do I have the crown?
Why do you have the crown?
I'm back with the shark, Sametori
Dry Dry Desert because it reminds me of the Gamecube times
I don't know what I chose
You chose a difficult looking one, Gura
Oh, there's one person that looks like you
But it could also be a Pekora fake
Would you say that looks like you?
Like when you're wearing the crown and can't see your pigtails.
Pekora fans are all faking her as well
Oh, I was trying to get that
It's like a wordplay on Darkrai and Usada
Her fans are like really strong though
And there we go. UsaDakura is number one. I expected nothing less.
They gotta get number one for Pekora.
What is the road I chose? I gotta do good in this one.
Wait, I'm so slow. Why am I so slow?
I like how this Mario... This Tanooki Mario yells.
I'm just using the Cat Peach because she's cute.
I thought I eliminated her previously.
I might have eliminated Mario's whole family in my Super Mario Sunshine stream
But they like to respawn, so it's all good, it's all good
Wait a moment, do you see how far away that Pekora fan is from all of us?
Who dares? Who dares to touch a phoenix?
Oh, I do be ghosting no, no, no, no, no, where are you good off?
I had it all in that moment.
I love how we're on the same level. That makes it feel very comfortable for me.
It's more of a challenge that way.
More chances for us to see each other in the race.
Mmm, TT. That's what I call TT.
Well, obviously, because we are the best in here, obviously.
What is that alien over there? Oh my god.
I like how really creative some people can get with their new creations.
That was genuine! I mean it!
Kuro, you also chose Animal Crossing as your map.
Do you like... Did you play the newest Animal Crossing?
I did. I have about... Just under 200 hours, I think.
Is that a lot? Is that a lot?
I played it a little bit in the beginning, like maybe for a month, but I quit already.
Maybe we should all get back to Animal Crossing. Ina is also playing it, I think.
She played it once on stream, I think.
This was the holocaust of Takanashi Kiana.
Wait, what is that flag? What is that flag? That's not an Australia flag. Bullshit.
That's a fake Australia flag. Look at my flag. That's an Australia flag.
There's a little bit more than minus the L.
I thought I could bonk that, though
I see somebody with a weird name
You have a shrimp challenging you, Gura
Can you beat him? Or her?
You're saying that like a politician
Under no circumstances may they beat me in this match
Where are you, by the way? I haven't seen you for a while.
Where are you? Ah, there you are!
Now I have a style, Gura. Now it's the other way around.
Let me get you. Let me get you. Let me get you.
I was too focused on finding you.
Oh, there's so much money, money, money, money, money.
I'm just chilling on the beach.
I wanna chill on the beach.
Wouldn't you like a nice beach holiday?
Like, what would be a nice beach destination?
Because sometimes sand is not so soft.
Oh, well, if you say so.
Tell them that there was only one person worse than us, and that was probably on purpose.
They were probably worse than us on purpose.
When I stream Mario Kart, my fans often like to wait for me at the finishing line.
Well, they have their job on the line. They lose their job if they don't let me win, so...
My members are my employees, and they lose their job when they don't let me win.
And you don't want to lose your job in a time like this, right?
Oh, I'm going for a rainbow road on purpose, even though I hate it. I hate it.
So if I win, does that mean that I get promoted to store manager?
No, you get promoted if you let me win.
That's how it is, Gura! That's how it is!
So, do you want a promotion? Go get it!
Hey, there's another Pekora fan in there!
No Sagi. No Sagi. The one with the blue hair with the blue pigtails. That's not you.
It says, ORA! I can't roll the R. Yeah, exactly. That's what the name says.
I can't roll! Like, when I speak German, we roll the R's, but I can't roll the R when I speak Japanese. I don't know why.
No, that's different. That's a different roll. We both didn't speed up. Nice one, Godard.
That's not it, right? That's like...
It needs a little bit more L in there, right?
I usually, when I roll my R's, I do it at the very tip of my tongue.
Damn it! I can't do it!
I can't do it! I can't be a Yakuza, ever!
Once you figure out that tongue roll, it's gonna be game over.
That's all it takes, right? That's all it takes.
Only gonna be good at rolling your R's.
Hoorah! I see you fighting with that nosagi, with that Pekora fan.
Who turned on and off the lights, man?
It completely messed up all my lights in my apartment.
It doesn't make me feel funny.
I can't hear you! You're too far away!
Well, actually, I see you in front of me anyways.
I like how we're always so close to each other.
It's so nice how we both suck.
How are you able to play?
I have to concentrate so hard.
Probably, if I would actually stop talking and concentrate, I would probably be much better at this game.
Good! We're like always next to each other!
Yeah, now we are. I was next to you for a second, but someone hit me with their goddamn shell!
Geschwindigkeit! Do you know what that means, Cora? My German champion.
You don't know? It's German for speed.
Let me show you some Geschwindigkeit.
We gotta do a follow-up on that Japanese lesson and teach you German instead.
Maybe you remember more German than you remember the Japanese that I told you.
Gura, you're so far away from me!
Why are you 6 and I'm 10? What the hell?
Was I getting sweaty while you were talking?
Let's go for Cheep Cheep Beach.
I don't think I've played the water park one before.
Is that the Cheep Cheep Beach?
You seem like the type to enjoy roller coasters, but am I wrong?
Um, I need a lot of pushing to get on the coaster, but once I'm on it, I have fun.
When I was on a rollercoaster, I crunched together and looked down, and my arms pushed against my head, and then at some point, I stopped screaming, and inside, I'm dying only.
There was one time, I was on a rollercoaster, and it's one that pulls you back like a rubber band.
I didn't know this, but when you get pulled back in one of those, because of the pressure when you get let go, you're not going to be able to breathe in, so you have to take a breath before it goes.
And I didn't do that. What happens if you don't breathe?
When I did that, I couldn't catch my breath, so I started panicking because I couldn't breathe. And it was dark, and my eyes were closed.
Did you die? Did you die? Well, no.
For how long could you not breathe?
It was only a few seconds.
But it really felt like a long time.
Why on all places are we on the rainbow realm?
Oh, I remember this. I remember something like this.
I mean, there's like... Is that actually the rainbow?
No, that's not the rainbow road.
I think there's like two roads that I keep on thinking it's the rainbow road, but it's not.
I'm gonna keep that red shell for when I see Gura.
Oh, are you in front of me? No.
No, you're not. How should I catch you if you're behind me?
Hey, where are you? What place are you in?
I don't know. I don't see it because your head is covering it up.
Do you want to move a little bit to the right or left? Just kidding.
Can you tilt your head to the very left right now?
No, I still don't see it.
I only saw the T-H. Something...
So it's probably not first, probably not second, and probably not third.
Wait, you're behind me! You're behind me!
Time for that red shell soon!
Ah, oh, no! It's a dead foe!
Car- I think that's called karma.
Not a chance, not what I'm done here.
Did you just fall down the edge?
Did you fall down the edge or no?
No. I think there's like a thing that keeps you from falling off the edge.
I had that on too, but it didn't save me one time. I fell down anyway.
Oh, maybe there's like certain places you can fall down.
Kura! Why are you in front of me again?
Gura! I'm coming! I'm coming with my bazooka!
Oh! I think I'm in front of you again!
But I like it. You just went places in front of me. That's how I like it.
It seems that we are close. This name is skill.
Yeah, I like it. I like it.
It appears so. The stars have aligned and placed us in exactly the same spot.
You know, when we talked about having this collab, and I asked you if you're good at this game and if you have practice and stuff,
you said you're really bad, and I didn't believe you. I thought you were being just humble, but you're actually bad, and I really like it!
I don't know, it's like a lot of RNG, but also it's shortcuts and knowing when to do your drifting, right?
Yeah, I think if you have some practice and some skill, you can do much better, I guess.
People keep on telling me to drift, but drifting often messes up my driving.
Yeah, it takes a lot of counteracting your own drifting.
Like if you're drifting left, you gotta steer right.
Also, did you figure out how to jump?
Because I tried the R button, but it didn't do anything.
It did do something for me. The top button. Not the big button on the top, but the small button. The R.
I will try. I want to do a flip. A 180 or a 360 or something like that.
Wah, wah, wah, wah, wah, wah, yee-haw!
Yeah, there you go. Is that the banjo?
We gotta win against the Canadians! There's a Canadian in front of me!
Go on back to your house, eh?
Yeah! Keep on dissing the Canadians! Very good!
Is that all you could come up with?
Tim Hortons is having a sale on donuts, don't you, eh?
Better go, ah, you better go get,
Donuts! Do Canadians like donuts that much?
I think so. I think Tim Hortons is a Canadian donut place.
Oh, really? I didn't know. Are they good?
I think so. I don't know.
Tim Hortons, sponsor us and send us some donuts.
I feel like I'm number one, but I'm probably somewhat around eight.
Wait, when did I get in 11th place?
Yee-haw! Yee-haw! You probably need to spam more yee-haws
Yee-haw! Yee-haw! Yee-haw! Yee-haw! Yee-haw! Yee-haw!
Kura, is that you or is that a shit ton of items?
Who ruined- Someone- I could have been next to you again, but Master FB or someone else hit me with a shell again.
I could have been next to you. God damn it.
Who ruined this titty moment again?
I bet they were saving that for you too.
Karma! It's karma for when you were saving that shell for me in the last place.
And it was a present! I thought you liked shells since you're from the ocean.
I love shells. I love pearl oyster shells and clam shells and mussel shells.
There you go. I wanted to help you with your collection of shells.
Come on, everyone, give all your red shells and green shells to Gura, because she's collecting them.
Do her a favor, do her a favor, and send them all to her.
And everybody... I don't know, come back for that?
Save your... Save your fiery items for Chiara.
I guess so, that's okay. The fiery phoenix?
Barely anyone ever gets that item anyway, that's okay.
All shouts to the turtle-gura. You are a turtle now. You are a turtle.
I am- I am- gao-gura. Turtle. How do you say turtle in Japanese?
Wait, I need a green... I need a fan out of you as green Gura.
Like, all the blue elements in your design have to be green.
Somebody give me a kame. Give me a turtle shell.
That's so perfect. Oh my god, kame... kame da ne.
Oh, that's the character in the game. And Marshall! Wow!
It's a cat character in one of the previous...
Or a few of the previous Animal Crossing games.
No, no, no, I'm not available right now, I'm busy
Some fire was sent to me, just as you have told them
Nice try with your conme shells, ladies and gentlemen.
Yeah! This is Buddha's race now!
I was doing so well! Where's the finishing line? I have no idea where I am right now.
Eeeeh! I was doing so well! Where's the finishing line? I have no idea where I am right now.
Oh, Kiana, what's wrong with you?
Garnet, you're way too far away from me! What the hell?
We were supposed to be on the same level!
I got lucky with a shell... Not a shell, with a gold mushroom at the end.
Next one, come on! I want... Ice skating sounds nice. Do you like to go ice skating?
I do. I think it'd be fun. Must have been a bit ago.
Me too, but ice skating is so much fun in winter. Best time ever.
No, I haven't done ice skating. I've done rollerblading.
Oh, I'm talking about ice skating.
I know, my brain went to rollerblading.
I love ice... Not ice... What's it called?
Oh, maybe that's just a name we use for it in German, even though it's English.
Have you seen people that go... I call it land skiing?
Have you ever seen that before?
Could they do it on land? They do it on the sidewalk. It's so crazy.
What? With the long skis? Are you sure?
Are you sure that's not hiking with just the two sticks on the side?
I mean, it looks like skiing.
Wait, does such a thing as Guta is explaining it actually exist or is she talking about hiking?
Come on, guys. Back me up. You know that's real.
Cross-country skiing? Is that a thing, actually?
It's real! I mean, I've seen...
I've seen people walking around with those sticks in their hands, but...
Their legs are on their land skis!
Is that a thing in Atlantis?
Why do we get the same items the whole time, you and me, Gura?
You got free mushrooms, I get free mushrooms.
You get a star, I get a star.
The game wants us to be in sync.
Beautiful. It's supporting our relationship, Gura.
You sent that shell to the wrong person, my friend.
It should have been addressed to Gura-chan.
It's time to take a flight, Kuro!
At least I'm next to you.
I like to see you in front of me.
That gives me a feeling of reassurance.
It makes me feel safe when you're in front of me.
I'm not sure if I should be worried, or...
Because then you're gonna pelt me with all your shit.
You can take that in so many ways.
I might just really mean it in a wholesome way.
Or I might mean it in a way of, I want to destroy you!

Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Where's my crown? God damn it. Okay, Gura?
That sounds good, let's do that. Alrighty, alrighty!
Which one should we go for? Last game, everyone!
Last game, get in while you can! And please leave if you just weren't in the race, please leave.
So we give one last chance to everyone else.
Kick those two? How do I kick people?
People telling me to kick them. Have they been in there for a while?
Thank you! Thanks you! Thanks you!
Thank you. Thank you. Thank you.
New people, you're welcome to come in.
If we choose random, does that choose randomly from those three?
Or from all of the races?
I don't know. I assume it'd be from the ones that are listed.
From all? Oh, it's from all?
Someone in the chat said all of them.
What up? You wanna race with us, huh?
Are you dare challenge us, Ametori?
You have no chance against us!
Okay, how about guys, we turn it around this time.
We're challenging you to lose against us.
Can you do it? Can you do it?
Let us see if you can take up this challenge.
Are you able to lose against us, huh?
That's gonna be a hard one.
It's actually a challenge. That is actually a challenge.
Oi, oi, oi! You're way too much in the front!
Good one. Why are you like...
You're like second or third or something.
Oh, it will change soon. Don't worry, good one.
Don't get used to it, Kura.
I'm so happy Kiara believes in me, guys.
Wait, I just want you to be with me.
Gura, why are these people actually trying to accept my challenge and lose against you?
But you're also supposed to lose against me!
Takodachi is not a good driver, I see
There's a fake Australian! That's the wrong flag, my dude!
That's the wrong flag, then I might
We're finally back together! Good I see you in front of me! I'm so happy to see you!
The item luck is strong in this one.
That thunder did not bother me.
I'm driving really bad right now.
And there's a blue shell coming for the first?
Blue Yoshi, you better not mess this up right now
Good job, good job, good job.
Those were some good races, good at.
You and me, we're a good team.
I had a lot of fun.
My... How do you call this?
Now you gotta go run 3 miles around the block a few times.
Hell yeah! I'm going to do that.
Thank you so much, Guida, for driving with me! It was a pleasure. Guida-senpai?
I'm looking forward to a future battle with you.
A future battle? As in Mario Kart? Or perhaps Smash?
I mean, yeah, I think we're probably also on the both levels in Smash as well, so...
That's a pen. Do you lose to the ledge, too?
Do you also fall off the map repeatedly?
Of course. Of course I do.
I like to say in German to my viewers
